table-entry.name: BOOK
table-entry.col-data: isbn varchar(17), title varchar(200) not null, author varchar(60) not null, edition_number varchar(60) not null, publisher varchar(200), price integer not null, available boolean default true, CONSTRAINT BOOK_ID_PK PRIMARY KEY(ISBN)

table-entry.name: MEMBER
table-entry.col-data: id ineteger generated always as identity (start with 100, increment by 1), name varchar(200) not null, city varchar(100) not null, address varchar(200) not null, mobile_no bigint not null, email_id varchar(100) not null, CONSTRAINT MEMBER_ID_PK PRIMARY KEY(ID)

table-entry.name: ISSUE
table-entry.col-data: isbn varchar(17), member_id ineteger, issue_time timestamp default current_timestamp, day_count integer default 0, CONSTRAINT ISSUE_ISBN_FK FOREIGN KEY(ISBN) REFERENCES BOOK(ISBN), CONSTRAINT ISSUE_MEMBER_ID FOREIGN KEY(MEMBER_ID) REFERENCES MEMBER(ID)
